Persuade, you say?\""},{"lineNumber":226495,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐわっははははははは！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gwahahahahahaha!!!!\""},{"lineNumber":226496,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この毛利が跡継ぎ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I, Mōri, am the heir!"},{"lineNumber":226497,"originalJapaneseLine":"　毛利元就を言葉で動かそうとするか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"  You really think you can move Mōri Motonari with words?!\""},{"lineNumber":226498,"originalJapaneseLine":"「面白い！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"How interesting!!!!\""},{"lineNumber":226499,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ククク……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kukuku..."},{"lineNumber":226500,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それならオレも器を見定めさせてもらおう」","translatedEnglishLine":"  If that’s the case, I’ll also judge your worth.\""},{"lineNumber":226501,"originalJapaneseLine":"元就はニィィと頬を歪めて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Motonari twisted his cheeks into a sly grin,"},{"lineNumber":226502,"originalJapaneseLine":"獰猛な笑みを浮かべた。","translatedEnglishLine":"showing a ferocious smile."},{"lineNumber":226503,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek...\""},{"lineNumber":226504,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、これを受け取れ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, take this.\""},{"lineNumber":226505,"originalJapaneseLine":"ポイッと乱雑に、","translatedEnglishLine":"With a careless die."},{"lineNumber":226508,"originalJapaneseLine":"　気絶くらいはするがな」","translatedEnglishLine":"  Though I might faint."},{"lineNumber":226509,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは何故か。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why is that?"},{"lineNumber":226510,"originalJapaneseLine":"　命を別のものに宿らされたからだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"  Because my life has been placed into another thing.\""},{"lineNumber":226511,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それがオレの命の矢。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Those are the arrows of my life."},{"lineNumber":226512,"originalJapaneseLine":"　心臓を破壊されても死なんが、","translatedEnglishLine":"  I wouldn’t die even if my heart is destroyed,"},{"lineNumber":226513,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そのたった三本の矢を折られると死ぬ」","translatedEnglishLine":"  but if those three slender arrows are broken, I die.\""},{"lineNumber":226514,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今、オレの目の前で、折れ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, do it in front of my eyes—break them.\""},{"lineNumber":226515,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah!?\""},{"lineNumber":226516,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうしたら、オレはついていってやる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you do, I will follow you.\""},{"lineNumber":226517,"originalJapaneseLine":"今、あなたの手の中にある、","translatedEnglishLine":"Right now, in your hand,"},{"lineNumber":226518,"originalJapaneseLine":"少し力を加えれば折れてしまいそうな、","translatedEnglishLine":"are three delicate arrows that look like they could break with a little pressure,"},{"lineNumber":226519,"originalJapaneseLine":"か細い三本の矢。","translatedEnglishLine":"three fragile, thin arrows."},{"lineNumber":226520,"originalJapaneseLine":"これが元就の命そのものらしい。","translatedEnglishLine":"These seem to be Motonari’s very life."},{"lineNumber":226521,"originalJapaneseLine":"それを折ってみせろと元就は言う。","translatedEnglishLine":"Motonari tells you to break them."},{"lineNumber":226522,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは……","translatedEnglishLine":"You..."},{"lineNumber":226523,"originalJapaneseLine":"ポッキン。","translatedEnglishLine":"Snap."},{"lineNumber":226524,"originalJapaneseLine":"三本の矢は小気味良い音を立てて、","translatedEnglishLine":"The three arrows make a satisfying snapping sound,"},{"lineNumber":226525,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたの手の中で真っ二つに折れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and break cleanly in half inside your hand."},{"lineNumber":226526,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーーーーーーーっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aaaaaaah!?\""},{"lineNumber":226527,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょ！　馬鹿馬鹿馬鹿！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey! You idiot, idiot, idiot!"},{"lineNumber":226528,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ななな、何してんの、お前ー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Wh-what the hell are you doing!?\""},{"lineNumber":226529,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんで折った、答えろ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why did you break them? Answer me!\""},{"lineNumber":226530,"originalJapaneseLine":"「誘惑くらい我慢しなさいよ馬鹿！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Just resist the temptation, you fool!\""},{"lineNumber":226531,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そこは俺も気になるけども！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I’m curious about that too, but!"},{"lineNumber":226532,"originalJapaneseLine":"　折っちゃ駄目でしょ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You’re not supposed to break them!\""},{"lineNumber":226533,"originalJapaneseLine":"「確かにポッキンって","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sure, the cracking sound felt"},{"lineNumber":226534,"originalJapaneseLine":"　気持ちよさそうだったけど！」","translatedEnglishLine":"pretty satisfying, but still!\""},{"lineNumber":226535,"originalJapaneseLine":"「クッ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kuh...\""},{"lineNumber":226536,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐわーっはっはっはっはっはっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gwahahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":226537,"originalJapaneseLine":"「気に入った！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I like you!!!!\""},{"lineNumber":226538,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ha...\""},{"lineNumber":226539,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあああ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?!\""},{"lineNumber":226540,"originalJapaneseLine":"「クカカカ！　本当に折る奴は！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kukakaka! Someone who really breaks them!"},{"lineNumber":226541,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔王の子の中でもお前が初めてだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"  Among the children of the Demon King, you’re the first!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「元就を相手にそれはやめておいた方がいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You’d better not do that against Motonari."
"If he takes a liking to you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはそれで面倒だから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that’s a whole different kind of trouble."
"Partner... here, we’ve got no choice but to somehow,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな暴れん坊、どうしたら言うこと聞くわけ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: how do you get a wild guy like this to listen?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 毛利元就を言葉で動かそうとするか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You really think you can move Mōri Motonari with words?!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それならオレも器を見定めさせてもらおう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If that’s the case, I’ll also judge your worth."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元就はニィィと頬を歪めて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Motonari twisted his cheeks into a sly grin,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 獰猛な笑みを浮かべた。
あなたは元就から三本の矢を投げ渡された。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you were thrown three arrows by Motonari.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「オレは首を落とされても死なん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even if my head is cut off, I won't die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気絶くらいはするがな」
命を別のものに宿らされたからだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because my life has been placed into another thing."
"Those are the arrows of my life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心臓を破壊されても死なんが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wouldn’t die even if my heart is destroyed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのたった三本の矢を折られると死ぬ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but if those three slender arrows are broken, I die."
"Now, do it in front of my eyes—break them."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうしたら、オレはついていってやる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you do, I will follow you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、あなたの手の中にある、
少し力を加えれば折れてしまいそうな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are three delicate arrows that look like they could break with a little pressure,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これが元就の命そのものらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These seem to be Motonari’s very life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを折ってみせろと元就は言う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Motonari tells you to break them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 三本の矢は小気味良い音を立てて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The three arrows make a satisfying snapping sound,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたの手の中で真っ二つに折れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and break cleanly in half inside your hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ななな、何してんの、お前ー！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wh-what the hell are you doing!?"
"Why did you break them? Answer me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誘惑くらい我慢しなさいよ馬鹿！」
「そこは俺も気になるけども！

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’re not supposed to break them!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気持ちよさそうだったけど！」
「ぐわーっはっはっはっはっはっ！」
「クカカカ！　本当に折る奴は！
魔王の子の中でもお前が初めてだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Among the children of the Demon King, you’re the first!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはそれで面倒だから」

命を別のものに宿らされたからだ」
